items.content_html: Insomnie is a lightweight CLI and TUI HTTP client for developers. Inspired by Postman, Insomnia, Bruno and Cartero, but with a minimalist text-based interface. Test and debug APIs quickly with an intuitive and customizable tool.
items.title: marco-gallegos/insomnie: Insomnie is a lightweight CLI and TUI HTTP client for developers. Inspired by Postman, Insomnia, Bruno and Cartero, but with a minimalist text-based interface. Test and debug APIs quickly with an intuitive and customizable tool.

items.content_html: Implementation of MQTT protocol over TCP, designed for web applications. Built with TypeScript, this MQTT client allows for efficient message queuing and lightweight messaging between devices. It supports core MQTT functionalities, including PUBLISH, SUBSCRIBE, and acknowledgment handling, making it suitable for real-time applications.
items.title: DiogoCunhaCardoso/MQQT-Client: Implementation of MQTT protocol over TCP, designed for web applications. Built with TypeScript, this MQTT client allows for efficient message queuing and lightweight messaging between devices. It supports core MQTT functionalities, including PUBLISH, SUBSCRIBE, and acknowledgment handling, making it suitable for real-time applications.

items.content_html: Glin-Profanity is a lightweight and efficient npm package designed to detect and filter profane language in text inputs across multiple languages. Whether you’re building a chat application, a comment section, or any platform where user-generated content is involved, Glin-Profanity helps you maintain a clean and respectful environment.
items.title: GLINCKER/glin-profanity: Glin-Profanity is a lightweight and efficient npm package designed to detect and filter profane language in text inputs across multiple languages. Whether you’re building a chat application, a comment section, or any platform where user-generated content is involved, Glin-Profanity helps you maintain a clean and respectful environment.
